title: Thoughts on veigar support?
body:
A few pros play him reguarly on ranked, and they build mostly movement speed/ ability power on him, i tried him a few times yesterday and hes pretty OP if your team knows how to follow up well. His non skillshot stun is 2.5 seconds at lvl 9, and at 488 movement speed, you can basically chase anyone and get them killed after you stun them

what are you guys thoughts on his viability, pros/cons?

replies.body: If current PBE changes are put in place Veigar's ability to support will fall through the floor as the reliability on his stun falls through the floor too.
Any champion with cc can play support as long as you can solve the mana issue.

Karthus very gud support xde
veig supp is good if you get 1-2 q stacks per wave, and know how to play it effectively..

His non skillshot stun

its a skill shot AOE.
He doesn't really have the same sustained presence that supports like Leona, Taric, Soraka, Janna and Sona bring. He's probably the same tier as Syndra/Zyra support, if not a bit worse.
Veigar supp is pretty fun, the only issue being with the inability to reach full potential without a constant flow of CS
I saw someone buy Relic Shield on Veigar support once. It allowed him to still be able to get stacks on Q whilst the adc still gets the gold. It was so damn smart of him.
